heroSubtitle: The Gloucester Zakat Charity is your trusted local charity for collecting and distributing Zakat to those in need within our community.

steps.title: Calculate Your Zakat
steps.description: Use our easy-to-use calculator to determine the amount of Zakat you need to pay.

steps.title: Give Securely Online
steps.description: Make your Zakat payment through our secure online portal with confidence.

steps.title: Impact Your Community
steps.description: We ensure your Zakat is distributed effectively to eligible recipients in Gloucester.

impactText: Every penny of your Zakat is a lifeline for someone in our community. We support families facing hardship, individuals seeking education, and those in critical need of assistance. Your contribution fosters a stronger, more resilient Gloucester for everyone.

testimonials.quote: The support from GZF was a blessing during a very difficult time for my family. We are so grateful.
testimonials.author: A Supported Family

testimonials.quote: Giving my Zakat through GZF gives me peace of mind, knowing it's helping people right here in my city.
testimonials.author: A Local Donor

testimonials.quote: As a student, the educational grant I received made all the difference. Thank you, GZF!
testimonials.author: A Student Recipient

ctaText: Join us in strengthening our community. Your contribution, big or small, makes a world of difference.
